metadata.title: CVE-2021-43519 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Stack overflow in lua_resume of ldo.c in Lua Interpreter 5.1.0~5.4.4 allowsattackers to perform a Denial of Service via a crafted script file.
